# Modern Age Coders
> India's Premier Live Online Coding Academy for Kids, Teens, and Professionals

## About
Modern Age Coders is a live online coding education platform based in India, offering personalized 1-on-1 and small batch coding classes. We teach programming, AI, Data Science, Web Development, and Mathematics to students of all ages - from kids (6+) to working professionals.

## Core Pages

### Homepage
- /
- Main landing page with course overview, testimonials, and enrollment CTAs

### Courses
- /courses - Course catalog and browsing
- /category/kids.html - Courses for children ages 6-12
- /category/teens.html - Courses for teenagers 13-17
- /category/college.html - Courses for college students
- /category/professionals.html - Courses for working professionals
- /category/corporate.html - Corporate training programs

### Lead Generation
- /book-demo - Schedule a free demo class
- /contact - Contact form and information
- /pricing - Pricing information

### About & Trust
- /about - Company information and team
- /success-stories - Student success stories
- /love - Student and parent testimonials (Love Wall)
- /student-projects - Showcase of student work
- /student-labs - Interactive coding labs

### Free Resources
- /free-resources - Free learning materials
- /blog - Educational blog with 46+ articles
- /coding-challenges - Daily coding practice challenges
- /maths-challenges - Daily mathematics challenges

### Tools & Games  
- /beat-the-babu - Coding game for practice
- /aura - Student achievement/gamification system
- /bootstrap - Bootstrap CSS learning resource

### For Businesses
- /business-solutions - Custom software solutions
- /corporate-training - Corporate training programs

### Legal
- /terms - Terms and conditions
- /privacy - Privacy policy

## Blog Topics
Our blog covers: coding for kids, programming languages, AI education, career guidance, college student resources, professional upskilling, business technology, mathematics, and parenting guides for tech education.

Blog index: /blog
All 46 blog posts accessible at /blog/[post-slug]

## Contact Information
- Website: https://learn.modernagecoders.com
- Primary Focus: Live online coding education
- Target Audience: Kids (6+), Teens, College Students, Working Professionals, Businesses
- Location: India (serving students nationwide)

## Key Features
- Live 1-on-1 classes
- Small batch classes (max 4 students)
- Free demo classes available
- Project-based learning
- Industry-recognized certificates
- Flexible scheduling

## Optional: Extended Documentation
For detailed course information, visit the individual course pages listed above.
